GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.15.54
GSD.description:
netfilter: nft_set_pipapo: release elements in clone from abort path

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.54 by commit 5ccecafc728b0df48263d5ac198220bcd79830bc, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit 3c4287f62044a90e73a561aa05fc46e62da173da. For more details please see the references link.
